image.alt: A tranquil forest with a cascading waterfall amidst greenery.
Golden dunes stretching to the horizon in the Sahara Desert.
Navigating the waters of the Amazon River, surrounded by dense rainforest.
The historic Incan citadel of Machu Picchu illuminated by the morning sun.
The powerful cascade of Victoria Falls, a natural wonder between Zambia and Zimbabwe.
Charming streets of Paris with historic buildings and cafes.
